import React,{useEffect}from'react';import'./App.css';import Header from'./components/Header';import HeroSection from'./components/HeroSection';import ProblemStatement from'./components/ProblemStatement';import Features from'./components/Features';import HowItWorks from'./components/HowItWorks';import SubscriptionPlans from'./components/SubscriptionPlans';import DailyMenu from'./components/DailyMenu';import SatisfactionGuaranteed from'./components/SatisfactionGuaranteed';import Testimonials from'./components/Testimonials';import DeliveryMap from'./components/DeliveryMap';import FAQ from'./components/FAQ';import Footer from'./components/Footer';import{createScrollObserver}from'./lib/utils';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){useEffect(()=>{// Mark document as JS-enabled for CSS transitions

const observer=createScrollObserver(entries=>{entries.forEach(entry=>{if(entry.isIntersecting){entry.target.classList.add('active');// Unobserve after activating to improve performance
observer.unobserve(entry.target);}});},{threshold:0.05});// Lower threshold to make it activate earlier
// Apply to any .section-fade elements
const fadeElements=document.querySelectorAll('.section-fade');// Short timeout to ensure elements are in the DOM
